attributes.action: Confiscate the passports of those who are arrested in any country for drunk and disorderly offences
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Brits seem to take delight in visiting Riga and drinking as much alcohol as they can.  In some cases they urinate on the city's Monument of Freedom and in ther cases - as happened last week - assult policemen who try to control them.  These people are a disgrace to the UK and should be forbidden from giving law abiding Brits a bad name
